Today we agreed to extend the post natal to 6 months and expand its coverage to almost all Chilean women workers
The 6-month post-natal right will benefit women with contracts for an indefinite or fixed term, work, work, temporary or honorary
We are going to give you the urgency that this project requires, so that all pregnant women and those who have already given birth, take advantage of this benefit

Today we inaugurate campaign "We take care of your time" of the Civil Registry. Via web, it will deliver the 4 most requested certificates for free.
We are also working on a Digital Portal and a Multiservice Network of the State to avoid unnecessary procedures and waste of time
@CaroRodriguezB_ the certificates are for Birth, Marriage, Death for Family Allowance and Birth for Tuition
